directions: Toss BelGioioso Fresh Mozzarella Ciliegine with olive oil, basil, oregano, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper.
Slice off pepper stem and stuff with a ball of Fresh Mozzarella.
ingredients: 5 ounces BelGioioso Fresh Mozzarella Ciliegine cheese
1 (16 ounce) jar pickled sweet cherry peppers or peppadew peppers
title: Fresh Mozzarella Stuffed Cherry Peppers
